item.title: [Python] I don't want to admit... The dynamical system representation of Neural Network
item.description: This article is the 18th day article of [NTT Communications Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/nttcom). Yesterday was @yusuke84’s article, Thinking about WebRTC Platform SkyWay support. **Merry Christmas! **:santa::christmas_tree::gift::santa::christmas_tree::gift::santa::christmas_tree::gift::santa::christmas_tree::gift::santa::christmas_tree::gift::santa: :christmas_tree::gift: #Introduction It’s the company’s Advent Calendar, so let’s write some technical tips at the beginning to keep up with the flow! So, I was searching for information about Neural Network, but in the end, I settled on a story that I was interested in, which was more theoretical than implementation, and this article is the end of it.
